front.title: Payload-independent Delineation for Simple Data Link (SDL) Framing

abstract.t: Simple Data Link (SDL) framing specification (rfc2823) defines a [length, length CRC] based construct with a tail-end payload CRC for delineating frames over digital links. Many protocols, however, already have built-in CRC mechanisms, and a tail-end CRC is not always needed. This draft proposes a modification to allow SDL receivers to delineate all types of payload without having to analyze payload protocol header to determine presence of CRC.
